title: Who Asked You? Sunday, October 18, 2015
text:
Who Asked You? Sunday, October 18, 2015 
Updated: Mon, Oct 19 2015, 01:09 AM 
CINCINNATI (WKRC) -- Mike Berk sits down with former Bengals kicker Doug Pelfrey to discuss the Bengals 6-0 start, and where the team is headed heading into the bye week. Related Stories 
LAMAR ODOM - TRACING HIS STEPS 
LAS VEGAS (AP) -- He's been in a hospital since Tuesday, as doctors try to save his life. Business News 
Stocks seek direction 
NEW YORK (AP) -- Major U.S. stock indexes have been hovering between small gains and losses as investors assess the latest company earnings. Science/Tech News 
IN THE NEWS: DAILY FANTASY SPORTS SHUT DOWN BY NEVADA REGULATORS 
LAS VEGAS (AP) -- Nevada officials are ordering daily fantasy sports sites like DraftKings and FanDuel to shut down -- saying the sites can't operate without a gambling license. Stay Connected:
